function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Digital technologies for tracking mobility pose privacy and ethical challenges","Impact":"Risk of privacy breaches, ethical concerns, and legal barriers","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection measures, adhere to ethical guidelines, and comply with privacy laws","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving technologies, encryption, anonymization","People":"General public, individuals using public transport","Owner":"Tech companies, government regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Use of public transport during pandemic may lead to increased risk of contagious diseases","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, increased transmission of pathogens","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures, ventilation improvements, and crowd control","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring, contactless payment, crowd monitoring systems","People":"Passengers, employees in the public transport sector","Owner":"Public transportation authorities, health agencies"},{"Description":"Conversion of car lanes into bike lanes and sidewalks may impact mobility behaviors","Impact":"Changes in mobility patterns, potential traffic congestion, and transportation infrastructure challenges","Mitigation":"Careful urban planning, traffic management strategies, and infrastructure development","Technologies":"Traffic modeling software, urban planning tools, smart city technologies","People":"City inhabitants, commuters, cyclists, pedestrians","Owner":"City authorities, urban planners"}]}
